constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_products_tour_subreservas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idsubreserva) REFERENCES tour_subreservas (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_products_variantes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (referencia) REFERENCES variantes (referencia) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_products_users_lastnick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (lastnick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_subreservas_products_users_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
